prosecution_story.accused_relationship: Related or friends of Allah Ditta
prosecution_story.incident_details: Complainant Luqman was attacked while watering his field on suspicion of illicit connection with Allah Ditta's wife. His nose and lip were cut, and he was belaboured.

grounds_for_dismissal: No denial of the right of a fair trial

key_points.defense_evidence: Complainant stated attackers had muffled faces and could not be identified
legal_references: Nathu Mal v. Abdul Haq A I R 1930 Lah. 159
Kesho Prasad Singh v. Ram Swarup Ahir A I R 1926 Pat. 176
Wazir Kunjra v. Emperor A I R 1929 Pat. 139
